thread.title: Helping a Business Owner Who Was $1.5M Behind on Taxes
thread.title_full: Helping a Business Owner Who Was $1.5M Behind on Taxes - WSJ

author: Cheryl Winokur Munk
title: Helping a Business Owner Who Was $1.5M Behind on Taxes
text:
The client was in his mid-40s with a net worth of about $24 million and two successful small businesses. But he didn’t keep careful track of his cash flow and made bad spending decisions. His mismanagement ultimately snowballed into $1.5 million of delinquent personal and business income taxes and a corresponding lien on his house—at which point he sought help from a financial adviser.
“When money’s coming in and you’re not... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
